General circulation models (GCMs) have been developed by many national and international research institutions and agencies and served as useful, and probably the only kind of tools to predict future climate
1, 2 . Since each GCM has been developed based on its own assumptions and unique mathematical representations of physical climate system processes, different climate projections are provided
